description.value:
This wand is made of chitin, topped with a hooked barb that weeps droplets of foul-smelling, green fluid when you Activate the wand.

Activate Cast a Spell

Frequency once per day, plus overcharge

Effect You cast a 6th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Spider Sting], but it deals @Damage[3d6[untyped]] damage on a touch or on a successful save, and delivers this poison.

Deadly Spider Venom (poison, virulent) Level 11

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[3d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 2} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[4d6[poison]] damage and enfeebled 2 (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[6d6[poison]] damage and enfeebled 2 (1 round)

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of spider sting at 6th-rank.
